function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Visiting urban parks and green spaces may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High visitation rates to urban green spaces in croatia and slovenia","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in travel distances to urban green spaces in different countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in transportation methods to urban green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of female respondents in all countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Age differences in respondent distribution between countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents with completed higher education in specific countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contagious and infectious diseases spreading through close contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data cleaning and filtering leading to incorrect analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify statistical differences in disease prevalence between countries and regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language barrier in translation of responses might result in misunderstanding of the intended meaning.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks associated with the collection and storage of open-ended responses.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias and subjectivity in the text mining analysis leading to skewed interpretations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrestricted self-selected survey may lead to biased representation of the population.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collected through personal and professional networks may not be diverse or representative of the entire population.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conclusions limited to the sampled population due to purposive sampling and internet survey administration.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online questionnaire distribution to the general public during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection concurrent with covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restrictions on ugs visitation during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in positive cases due to initial allowance of outdoor activities leading to stricter restrictions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dramatic increase in positive cases leading to strict limitations on outdoor activities and public spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Allowance of outdoor activities with warnings to keep distance and avoid gatherings leading to prolonged restrictions and increased monitoring.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global impact of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changed relation between humans and public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversity of societies and cultures in study countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in attitudes toward urban green spaces based on cultural background and environmental factors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in citizens’ behavior and perceptions of urban green spaces in response to external events","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on citizens’ behavior and perceptions of urban green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urbanization leading to overcrowding and density in cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stressful everyday lifestyle leading to weakened immune systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to green spaces and natural environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manual design/redesign of physical spaces in response to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ad-hoc methodology for arranging physical spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient utilization of proposed solution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming a given physical space and constraints based on basic mathematical shapes may not accurately reflect the complexities of a built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stricter social distancing requirements may not be the only constraints to consider in the design of built environments for disease propagation mitigation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feasible solutions for seating arrangements may not always be practical due to additional practical considerations such as space for food trolleys.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex geometry with non-convex convoluted structures creates challenges for optimization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for suboptimal airflow within spaces due to complex geometry and constraints","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to effectively implement social distancing and other physical constraints in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalanced air distribution due to the positioning of fans and air-conditioners leading to stagnant air pockets.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimal arrangement of chairs and tables may not allow for sufficient social distance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow circulation in the closed environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Arranging objects in circular or elliptic rooms may create congestion and limit airflow, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for social distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective airflow within physical environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases in a crowded room with 35 people","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxing constraints on social distancing in interior spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple algorithms for optimization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Storage and display of output data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"}]}
